def can_balance_by_removing_one_char(s: str) -> bool:
    """

    Returns:

    """
    return any((len(set(Counter(s.replace(c, '', 1)).values())) != 1 for c in s))

def can_balance_by_removing_one_char(s: str) -> bool:
